name: Splendiforus
description:
Splendiforus! is a 2.5D platformer where you must bring color back into the city by collecting 3 of your most favorite things and bringing them back to your home. Also, it has a very deep and philosophical meaning behind it. 

This game was developed by the Splendiforus game jam team for the AIE Spring 2022 Game Jam

Designers

  • Robert McKee
  • Jasper Conley
  • Michael Kennish

Programmers

  • Jack Murray
  • Will Benham

Artists

  • Danny Hipolito
  • Josiah Hummel
  • Linsay Burgner
  • Connor Nolan
